title: MiniMetis Swap
description: MiniMetis Decentralised Exchange for trade and swap tokens in Metis Andromeda
comingSoon: MiniMetis Decentralised Exchange is being developed right now and will be launched soon. Please check telegram or discord for more information
maximumSoldInfo: The maximum amount of tokens you are willing to sell
minimumReceivedInfo: The minimum amount of tokens you will receive
priceImpactInfo: The difference between market price and estimated price due to trade size and available liquidity
liquidityProviderFeeInfo: 0.30% of each trade is deducted from the "From Token" and distributed to liquidity provider(0.25%) and MiniMetis treasury(0.05%)
tradeRouteInfo: The best trading route taken to give you best price for your token swap
getTradeLinkInfo: Generate link to the current trading pair or pick your favourite pairs
selectNamePlaceholder: Enter token name, symbol or address
